questions.question: Which of the following does TypeScript use to specify types?
questions.explanation: TS uses a colon (:) to separate the property name from the property type

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a type used in TypeScript?
questions.explanation: Enum is not used as a type in TypeScript

questions.question: Which is NOT an access modifier?
questions.explanation: Async is not used as an access modifier type in typeScript but for asynchronous work

questions.question: What can you lazy load in Angular
questions.explanation: In Angular you can lazy load modules

questions.question: What is the preferred way to use services in Angular
options: make an instance in your component
questions.explanation: A service should always be injected through the constructor of a component

questions.question: Which is an array method to generate a new array based on a condition?
questions.explanation: Filter is a method used to conditionally create a new array
